concept.title: Pixel Formats
concept.shortdesc: The graphics system supports a variety of pixel formats to represent pixel buffer data in RGB, YUV and luminosity formats.

conbody.p: There is an API to specify and retrieve system-defined and user-defined pixel formats. The pixel formats are defined by the type TUidPixelFormat, which represents the underlying layout of the pixels. New pixel formats can be defined by using a unique UID value.
